valid-email-error: Please enter a valid email address
message-cannot-contain-more: The message cannot contain more than 500 characters
get-the-complete-dataset: Get the complete Dataset for Free
please-give-us-some-hints: Please give us some hints who you are, what you plan to do with the data and which data you need the most. Fill out this survey is completely voluntary but will help a lot to provide even better data in the future.
tell-us-your-first-name: Please tell us your First name (optional)
tell-us-your-last-name: Please tell us your Last name (optional)
what-dataset-for: For what do you would like to use the dataset? (optional)
what-kind-of-scenario: What kind of scenario would be the most interesting for you? (optional)
what-most-important-quality-aspects: What are the most important quality aspects of the data for you? (optional)
anything-else: Do you have anything else you want to tell us? (optional)
allowed-to-contact-you: Are we allowed to contact you to have a short chat about your needs and further improvement of your data?
get-back-to-you: We'll get back to you in 1-2 business days.
